analytic.title: The Impact of Arabic Translations on the Syrian Orthodox Revival of the Twentieth Century

monogr.title: Symposium Syriacum XII: Held at St Lawrence College, Rome 19–21 August 2016. Organized by the Pontifical Oriental Institute on the Occasion of the Centenary Celebration (1917–2017)

body.bibl: Dinno, Khalid. “The Impact of Arabic Translations on the Syrian Orthodox Revival of the Twentieth Century.” In Symposium Syriacum XII: Held at St Lawrence College, Rome 19–21 August 2016. Organized by the Pontifical Oriental Institute on the Occasion of the Centenary Celebration (1917–2017), edited by Emidio Vergani and Sabino Chialà, 539–50. Orientalia Christiana Analecta 311. Roma: Pontificio Istituto Orientale, 2022.
